generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with a cobblestone texture, marked by lane lines and curbs, suitable for vehicle traffic.
- sidewalk: A paved pedestrian area is visible on the left side of the road, separated by metal bollards and bordered by a curb.
- building: A large, classical-style building with multiple windows and ornate architectural details is visible in the background.
- vegetation: Numerous trees with dense foliage line both sides of the road, and a hedge runs along the front of the building.
- car: A black sedan and a silver SUV are parked on the right side of the road.
- pole: Several metal bollards are visible along the sidewalk, and a street sign pole is visible near the center of the image.
- traffic sign: A circular traffic sign with a red border and a blue background is visible on the right side of the road.
- terrain: A small patch of grass is visible in the foreground on the left side of the image.
